Name: EA Play
About the game: Don’t just get the game. Get more from your game with EA Play. Members get more rewards, more exclusive content, and unlimited access to more top titles. Get more from the games you love with members-only challenges and in-game rewards. Take your favorite titles to the next level with content that lets you stand out from the competition. Get instant access to a collection of EA’s best-loved games on Steam. Plus, try select new-release games — not betas or demos — and your progress carries over if you decide to buy. Members receive a 10% discount on EA digital purchases on Steam, including full games, Season Passes, DLC, and more. Ready to play the best of EA? Sign up now. Cancel anytime.
